short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An experimental version of Crossmark wallet, a self-custodial wallet in your browser | Learn more at https://crossmark.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark is a experimental version of Crossmark, a browser-first, non-custodial wallet built for interacting with the XRP Ledger. Learn more at https://www.crossmark.io

Security. 
Embark is a noncustodial wallet that uses industry standard practices to encrypt users private keys. Our key management system has been audited by some of the largest auditing firms and experts in the industry. The encrypted private keys never leave your device, giving you full control of your wallets and digital assets.

Functionality. 
Embark enables users to easily engage with all XRPL ecosystem dApps. Designed with future functions on the XRPL in mind, Embark integrates with all custom XRPL networks for ease of development and testing.

Customizability. 
Embarksâ€™ opt-in features allow users to curate their own experience on the platform. Email notifications, NFT cards, etc.

Adaptability.
Embark supports different XRPL custom networks
